DOC.brief_summary: This study assess safety , tolerability , efficacy LCZ696 hypertensive patient renal dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Efficacy LCZ696 Japanese Hypertensive Patients With Renal Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Renal finding : Hypertensive patient renal dysfunction stable renal condition least 4 week screen visit . Satisfy office msSBP ≥140 mmHg < 180 mmHg baseline . Patients show msDBP ≥110 mmHg and/or msSBP ≥180 mmHg . History angioedema , drugrelated otherwise , report patient . Any following renal disorder : Patients show eGFR < 15mL/min/1.73m^2 Patients dialysis Patients previously enter LCZ696 study randomize enrolled active drug treatment epoch . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
